      • loadFromPath

        public static Image loadFromPath(String path,
                 String name)
        Load an image with specific path. Ignores the root folder.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the folder the image is located in
        name - Name of the image
        Returns:
        The loaded image or null, if any error occurred
        See Also:
        load(String)

        Returns:

      • fullLoad

        public static Image fullLoad(String name)
                      throws IOException
        Load an image from given path relative to root folder. If it has been loaded before a reference is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - image name
        Returns:
        The image
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs during reading

      • clearMemory

        public static void clearMemory()
        All loaded Images will be released. The next call to load a image will read it from file not memory.

      • freeImage

        public static void freeImage(String path,
             String name)
        Release a specific image if it exists.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to image's folder
        name - image's name

               String name,
               Image img)
        Manually insert a image
        Parameters:
        path - path of the image (Identifier)
        img - the image that was stored previously at this position
        Returns:
        the image that was previously at this position
